front.title: Diameter ITU-T Rw Policy Enforcement Interface Application

abstract.t: This document describes the need for a new pair of IANA Diameter Command Codes and a new vendor-specific Application ID to be used in a vendor-specific new application, namely for the ITU-T Rec. Q.3303.3 - Rw interface used to send a request/responses for controlling the policy enforcement in a network element, as one of the recommendations of the International Telecommunication Union - Telecommunication Standardization Sector (ITU-T).
